title: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: The dialog details have the following issues:

i. The duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page.
ii. The first and second columns could be merged.
OB:
a. The buttons are too small.
b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.
c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
d. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
EB:
a. The marking between the button and the list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog.
b. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic.
c. Multiple selection should be allowed, as the move up/down functionality can be applied on more than one item.
d. The signature preview must be a label that wraps. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.
e. The signature preview must have a label that warps.
